title: The Virus
description: Enemies touching you take 12 damage, then a poison effect is applied for 6-7 ticks, dealing damage equal to the amount of red hearts you have (up to 30.8 at 12 full red hearts)
Has a chance to drop from the Lust miniboss fight
Counts as 1 of 3 syringe items needed towards the Spun transformation
REPENTANCE - +0.2 Speed Up (Used to be -0.1 Speed before Repentance). No longer drops black hearts like it used to. Damage scales with total heart containers.
